attributes.action: ensure that any investigation into the 'Cash For Honours' scandal be conducted by an independant body...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to be completely fair and above board it needs someone INDEPENDANT of the Prime Minister to make any decisions as the criminal proceedings... The decisions petaining to the allegations MUST be made by someone who has NOT received certain priviledges in the past... You cannot be deemed as 'independant' if you are a friend of one of the accused and have received a title for previous assistance offered... In other words, remove Lord Goldsmith from the equation and the investigations can be deemed as truely independant...

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
